# SetGuiVisibleCommand

**Extends:** [ESCBaseCommand](../ESCBaseCommand) < [Node](../Node)

## Description

`set_gui_visible visible`

Show or hide the GUI.

**Parameters**

- *visible*: Whether the GUI should be visible (`true` or `false`)

@ESC
